sentences.english: We used a submaximal effort tourniquet test to induce ischemic pain.
sentences.chinese: 我们使用了亚努力止血带试验诱发缺血性疼痛。

sentences.english: Yet regulating haemostasis is a complex balancing act.
sentences.chinese: 然而控制止血法这一平衡过程相当复杂。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the hemostatic effect of gelatin fleece (GF) on different traumatic bleeding.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨明胶纤维网在不同出血创面的止血效果。

sentences.english: Results 26 patients were all stanched by the way above-mentioned.
sentences.chinese: 结果26例患者经上述治疗后全部止血。

sentences.english: A tourniquet should never be used.
There are many methods of haemostasis for you to gra .
sentences.chinese: 你要掌握很多止血方法。

sentences.english: Stop any bleeding injury by applying direct pressure to the wound.
sentences.chinese: 如有流血的外伤，立即直接压迫伤处止血。

sentences.english: Objective To study the effect of Reptilase in the burn and plastic surgery.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察立止血在烧伤整形手术中的止血效果。

sentences.english: Objective To study the effect of Reptilase in the burn and plastic surgery.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察立止血在烧伤整形手术中的止血效果。

sentences.english: The key function is removing stasis, stopping blood and pain, activating blood, detoxication, relieving swelling.
sentences.chinese: 化瘀止血，活血止痛，解毒消肿。

sentences.english: I don't think the cloth bandages can stop the bleeding. What we need is a tourniquet.
sentences.chinese: 我不认为布绷带可以止血，我们需要止血带。

sentences.english: I don't think the cloth bandages can stop the bleeding. What we need is a tourniquet.
sentences.chinese: 我不认为布绷带可以止血，我们需要止血带。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the hemostatic effect of emergent hemostasis patch (EHP).
sentences.chinese: 目的观察急救止血敷片的止血作用。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the hemostatic effect of emergent hemostasis patch (EHP).
sentences.chinese: 目的观察急救止血敷片的止血作用。

sentences.english: Cuttlebone can be used as a medicine to stanch bleeding.
sentences.chinese: 海螵蛸可以入药，用来止血。

sentences.english: Sanguisorba officinalis L. is a hemostatic agent in TCM and has a higher medicinal value in clinic.
sentences.chinese: 地榆为中医临床常用止血药，有较高的药用价值。

definition: to detoxify/to relieve fever (in Chinese medicine)
variant of 包紮|包扎[bao1 za1]
to wrap up/to pack/to bind up (a wound)
to bleed/bleeding/(fig.) to spend money in large amounts
to strike back/to beat back/to counterattack
to invigorate blood circulation and alleviate pain (idiom)
dominant/controlling/strong/opposite: weak, yielding 弱受/to take by storm (military)
to reduce swelling/detumescence/(fig.) to streamline (a bloated bureaucracy etc)
